00031     int Action::binComp(void) {
00032       Value v1 = stack->pop();
00033       Value v2 = stack->pop();
00034       return(compare(v2, v1));
00035     }
00036 
00037     bool Action::negativeOperand(void) {
00038       Value v1 = stack->peek(-1);
00039       Value v2 = stack->peek(-2);
00040       
00041       if ( (v1.type == Value::INT && v1.itg < 0) ||
00042            (v2.type == Value::INT && v2.itg < 0) )
00043         return(true);
00044       
00045       return(false);
00046     }
00047 
00048 
00049     void Action::binaryFalseResult(void) {
00050       Value v(0);
00051       
00052       stack->drop();
00053       stack->drop();
00054       stack->push(v);
00055     }
00056     
00057 
00058     void Action::hasAtom(void) {
00059       if (atom == 0)
00060         throw(std::runtime_error("No atom set"));
00061     }
00062     
00063 
00064     void Action::setStack(ValueStack* ptr) { stack=ptr; }
00065     void Action::setAtom(pAtom& pa) { atom = pa; }
00066 
00067     std::string Action::name(void) const { return(my_name); }

00072     void pushString::execute(void) { stack->push(val); }
00073     std::string pushString::name(void) const {
00074       std::stringstream s;
00075       s << my_name << "(" << val << ")";
00076       return(s.str());
00077     }

00094     void drop::execute(void) { stack->drop(); }

00096     void dup::execute(void) { stack->dup(); }
00097 
00098     void equals::execute(void) {
00099       Value v(binComp() == 0);
00100       stack->push(v);
00101     }
00102 
00103     void lessThan::execute(void) {
00104       if (negativeOperand())
00105         binaryFalseResult();
00106       else {
00107         Value v(binComp() < 0);
00108         stack->push(v);
00109       }
00110     }
00111 
00112     void lessThanEquals::execute(void) {
00113       if (negativeOperand())
00114         binaryFalseResult();
00115       else {
00116         Value v(binComp() <= 0);
00117         stack->push(v);
00118       }
00119     }
00120 
00121 
00122     void greaterThan::execute(void) {
00123       Value v(binComp() > 0);
00124       stack->push(v);
00125     }
00126 
00127     void greaterThanEquals::execute(void) {
00128       Value v(binComp() >= 0);
00129       stack->push(v);
00130     }

00132     void matchRegex::execute(void) { 
00133       Value v = stack->pop();
00134       Value r(0);
00135       if (boost::regex_search(v.getString(), regexp))
00136         r.setInt(1);
00137       
00138       stack->push(r);
00139     }
00140 
00141     std::string matchRegex::name(void) const {
00142       return(my_name + "(" + pattern + ")");
00143     }
00144   
00145 
00146 
00147     void matchStringAsRegex::execute(void) {
00148       Value v = stack->pop();
00149       boost::regex re(v.getString(), boost::regex::perl|boost::regex::icase);
00150       Value u = stack->pop();
00151       Value r(0);
00152       
00153       if (boost::regex_search(u.getString(), re))
00154         r.setInt(1);
00155       
00156       stack->push(r);
00157     }
00158   
00159     void extractNumber::execute(void) {
00160       Value v = stack->pop();
00161       Value r(-1);
00162       boost::smatch what;
00163       
00164       if (boost::regex_search(v.getString(), what, regexp)) {
00165         unsigned i;
00166         int val;
00167         for (i=0; i<what.size(); i++) {
00168           if ((std::stringstream(what[i]) >> val)) {
00169             r.setInt(val);
00170             break;
00171           }
00172         }
00173       }
00174       
00175       stack->push(r);
00176     }
00177 
00178     std::string extractNumber::name(void) const {
00179       return(my_name + "(" + pattern + ")");
00180     }

00214     void logicalAnd::execute(void) {
00215       Value v2 = stack->pop();
00216       Value v1 = stack->pop();
00217 
00218       if (!(v1.type == Value::INT && v2.type == Value::INT))
00219         throw(std::runtime_error("Invalid operands to logicalAnd"));
00220       
00221       Value u(v1.itg && v2.itg);
00222       stack->push(u);
00223     }
00224 
00225 
00226     void logicalOr::execute(void) {
00227       Value v1 = stack->pop();
00228       Value v2 = stack->pop();
00229       
00230       if (!(v1.type == Value::INT && v2.type == Value::INT))
00231         throw(std::runtime_error("Invalid operands to logicalOr"));
00232       
00233       Value u(v1.itg || v2.itg);
00234       stack->push(u);
00235     }
00236 
00237 
00238     void logicalNot::execute(void) {
00239       Value v1 = stack->pop();
00240 
00241       if (v1.type != Value::INT)
00242         throw(std::runtime_error("Invalid operand to logicalNot"));
00243       
00244       Value u(!v1.itg);
00245       stack->push(u);
00246     }
00247 
00248     void logicalTrue::execute(void) {
00249       Value v((int)1);
00250       stack->push(v);
00251     }
00252 
00253 
00254     void Hydrogen::execute(void) {
00255       hasAtom();
00256       
00257       bool masscheck = true;
00258       if (atom->checkProperty(Atom::massbit))
00259         masscheck = (atom->mass() < 1.1);
00260       
00261       std::string n = atom->name();
00262       Value v;
00263       v.setInt( (n[0] == 'H' && masscheck) );
00264       stack->push(v);
00265     }
00266
